headline: Heavy Equipment Wear Parts
subHead: Blades, Teeth, Spare Parts, Tracks, and Major Components for Heavy Equipment

equipment.title: Get Parts for Your Equipment
equipment.subTitle: We have replacement parts for these brands and more:
equipment.content: If you are like most contractors, you are looking for proven ways to trim expenses. We can help! We stock parts to fit equipment from Cat scrapers to Bobcat skidsteers, pavers to trenchers and loaders to excavators.
equipment.contentList: Bobcat, Barber - Greene, Blaw Knox, Broce, Case, Caterpillar, John Deere, Komatsu, Volvo, Doosan, Fiat, Ford-New Holland, Gallion, Gehl, Hitachi, Hyundia, JCB, Kubota, Liebherr, Linkbelt, Massey Ferguson, Takeuchi, Terex, Yanmar

parts.title: Heavy Equipment Wear Parts You Can Depend On
parts.content: Southwest Construction Parts has served the Southwest for over 20 years as an independent dealer of wear parts and components for most makes of heavy equipment. We have supplied the greater Southwest with high quality heavy equipment wear parts at affordable prices. We work with dependable suppliers and carry a wide range of components.
parts.cta: Give use a call for a quote.
